column2: As your health gets lower your performance increases
You gain an aura of magical transmutation that affects 3 random materials
Holy mountains will have a guaranteed extra perk, but at a cost...
Your projectiles cause larger, more destructive explosions.
You may come and go as you please from the Holy Mountain.
Killing enemies rapidly builds a killstreak which awards more gold.
Receive significantly less damage, but damage is permanent.
You heal for the amount gained when gaining maximum health.
You become immune to enemy damage for a short time after taking enemy damage.
You purify the earth around you
You deal significantly more damage, but the ground tremors at your might
You experience no recoil as long as you are grounded.
Spells you cast will cost two thirds as much mana.
Your flasks can now hold twice as much.
You cast all of your wand's spells at once.
Your max health is tripled, but you're unable to gain more health from hearts
You convert nearby Polymorphine to Acid, and gain immunity to being polymorphed.
Your damage increases the closer you are to death.
The next stackable perk you take will be taken three times, but your max health is reduced.
You slowly heal while out of combat, but your flesh is weak.
You are more resistant to damage from status ailments.
Taking damage makes you enter a state of rage briefly.
You have a chance not to use spell charges
Summon a box which may hold treasures within
Summon a box of medical supplies you can take with you
Confuse your enemies by swapping places with your attacker.
You become immune to lava and burns, bleed lava, and become hydrophobic!
From now on wands you find will have slightly better stats.
All that was lost returns to you.
The weight of the scales are relieved, but your options are running out.
Gamble on your life! You have a chance to revive upon death, but can take critical hits.
Every spell in your inventory is consumed, but you get an equal amount of random spells back!
The longer you spend in the air, the less damage you take.
This perk is missing its localization data!
